PublicKeyCredentialParseRequestOptionsFr.summary: The parseRequestOptionsFromJSON() static method of the interface converts a {{glossary("JSON type representation")}} into its corresponding publicKey request credentials options object structure.

remarks.para: The method is a convenience function for converting information provided by a relying server to a web app in order to request an existing credential.

PublicKeyCredentialParseRequestOptionsFr.returns: An object with the Web Authentication API publicKey request credentials options object structure.
